title: How to Change Your App Mode in Windows 10

steps.headline: Open the Settings app.
steps.description: Press the Start button and select the settings gear from the lower right corner.

steps.headline: Click or tap the Personalization category.
Select Colors from the left pane.
Change the app mode.
steps.description: Scroll down and find the section labeled as "Choose your default app mode". Pick "Dark" or "Light" from the list to change the look of Windows. Enjoy the beauty of black, or bright white!

text: Open the Settings app. Press the Start button and select the settings gear from the lower right corner. Click or tap the Personalization category.  Select Colors from the left pane.  Change the app mode. Scroll down and find the section labeled as "Choose your default app mode". Pick "Dark" or "Light" from the list to change the look of Windows. Enjoy the beauty of black, or bright white!

Click or tap the Personalization category.

Scroll down and find the section labeled as "Choose your default app mode".
Pick "Dark" or "Light" from the list to change the look of Windows.
Enjoy the beauty of black, or bright white!
